definition: of or relating to or advocating nativism, a philosopher who subscribes to nativism
details:
adjective
- of or relating to or advocating nativism
= example: of or relating to or advocating nativism
= synonyms: nativistic
- advocating the perpetuation of native societies
= example: advocating the perpetuation of native societies
= synonyms: nativistic
noun
- a philosopher who subscribes to nativism
